Telescope consisted of a 15.4-mum thick delta-E
detector, area 150 mm**2, alpha energy resolution 50
keV and a 500-mum thick E-detector, area 450 mm-sq,
alpha energy resolution 19 keV. The energy calibration
of the detector was done using the well-known energies
Nd-143(n,alpha)Ce-140 reactions and of the U-234,
U-235 and Cf-252 radio-active decay alphas
The measuring system was first tested with the
spontaneous fission Cf-252, using a source with an
activity of 70 KbQ. A 30-mum thick Al-foil was placed
in between the source and the telescope in order to
